current_focus.title: Protocol parity + deep architecture/file-format reverse
current_focus.notes: S9P remains active. Tooling gate G1 is validated under debug-copy instrumentation; I3 runtime hardening aligned arm64 hooks and deterministic Frida process selection, producing high-signal transfer-store persistence traces while format-synthesis and parity gates remain open.

stages.title: Core P2P MVP + 25 messages
stages.notes: Established core login/search/download/upload baseline with KB-first artifacts.

stages.title: Runtime refresh and confidence promotion
stages.notes: Refreshed runtime captures and promoted medium-confidence core mappings to high.

stages.title: Authenticated login + semantic parity
stages.notes: Validated real login tuple and switched differential verification default to semantic mode.

stages.title: Rooms + Presence batch
stages.notes: Added room list/join/leave/presence coverage with runtime-backed evidence.

stages.title: Recommendations + Discovery batch
stages.notes: Implemented recommendation request/response paths and semantic verification coverage.

stages.title: Peer advanced + room moderation
stages.notes: Expanded peer/user-info and room moderation message coverage with runtime captures.

stages.title: Privileges + social + peer folder
stages.notes: Added privilege flows and peer-folder requests including decompression prep groundwork.

stages.title: Privilege/messaging gaps + peer legacy cleanup
stages.notes: Closed messaging and legacy peer gaps, promoting remaining medium mappings.

stages.title: Private messaging + user-state
stages.notes: Introduced typed private-message/user-state operations and semantic field-level parity.

stages.title: Global/admin/distributed mapping
stages.notes: Mapping-first jump-table extraction for global/admin/distributed control families.

stages.title: Parent/distributed tuning mapping
stages.notes: Mapped parent/distributed tuning codes before typed runtime promotion.

stages.title: Global room/system control mapping
stages.notes: Mapped system and room-control continuation set from static evidence.

stages.title: Ticker/term control mapping
stages.notes: Mapped ticker/term families for later runtime-typed hardening.

stages.title: Private-room ownership/membership mapping
stages.notes: Mapped private-room ownership/membership controls and ownership transitions.

stages.title: Missing-code closure + implementation
stages.notes: Closed missing message-code bucket with mapping and protocol implementation support.

stages.title: Mapped-not-implemented closure
stages.notes: Reached full matrix closure: implemented and mapped totals aligned at 131/131.

stages.title: Typed runtime hardening wave 1
stages.notes: Promoted opaque control payload families to typed variants with runtime-authenticated evidence.

stages.title: Soulseek UI and feature audit
stages.notes: Completed full feature inventory and second-pass verification for UI/protocol linkage.

stages.title: Typed runtime hardening wave 2
stages.notes: Converted room/term controls from opaque payload handling to typed runtime-backed variants.

stages.title: Typed runtime hardening waves 3-7
stages.notes: Completed multi-wave control typing pack and reduced opaque closure set from 34 to 15.

stages.title: Visual dashboard + codebase visualizer + collapsed PR catalog
stages.notes: Introduce dashboard-first navigation and high-signal project observability views in Zensical.

stages.title: S5A closure hardening audit and regression gate
stages.notes: Adds an executable closure audit for S5A objectives (runtime evidence, decompression parser, residual hypotheses) with regression coverage.

stages.title: Opaque-tail executable baseline and batch plan
stages.notes: Adds executable inventory for remaining opaque control codes and publishes batch plan to drive S6 typed-promotion iterations.

stages.title: Opaque-tail reduction for remaining generic and legacy control payloads
stages.notes: Completed S6D typed-batch closure and S6E dedicated legacy reduction; generic opaque-tail is zero.

stages.title: Dedicated residual semantic closure for legacy controls
stages.notes: Closed remaining residual semantics for SM_DNET_DELIVERY_REPORT (128) and SM_FLOOD (131) with runtime-backed typed payload promotion.

stages.title: Roadmap rebaseline for runtime-complete closure and TUI transition
stages.notes: Reframed next execution line to strict runtime closure, semantic-depth closure, core orchestration, and TUI progression.

stages.title: Strict runtime closure to 131/131 verified runtime
stages.notes: Promoted the 30 static-only rows using hybrid runtime evidence and enforced regression gate verified_static=0.

stages.title: Semantic-tail closure for residual extension fields
stages.notes: Closed the 9 partial-tail payload branches by replacing raw-tail placeholders with explicit extension-reserved semantics.

stages.title: Core transfer orchestration for automated download flow
stages.notes: Added search-select-download orchestration API, CLI download-auto command, and runtime scenario coverage.

stages.title: Capabilities matrix and critical-path dashboard
stages.notes: Introduced capability registry, matrix artifacts, and visual blocker/critical-path dashboard.

stages.title: Minimal TUI v1 for core transfer workflows
stages.notes: Minimal TUI supports login, query edit, search, result selection, and download orchestration over soul-core.

stages.title: Release hardening and v1 closure gates
stages.notes: Capability-first release hardening closure is complete: redaction metadata hardening, packaging flow, recovery runbooks, and closure audit are green.

stages.title: TUI-first simplification and persistence hardening
stages.notes: Completed TUI module split, mandatory login gate, retro orange UX, persisted credentials/history, and startup recovery semantics with green regression gates.

stages.title: Protocol parity + deep architecture/file-format reverse
stages.notes: S9P remains active. Tooling gate G1 is validated under debug-copy instrumentation; I3 runtime hardening aligned arm64 hooks and deterministic Frida process selection, producing high-signal transfer-store persistence traces while format-synthesis and parity gates remain open.

stages.title: SwiftUI macOS GUI MVP on top of soul-cli JSON mode
stages.notes: Paused by S9P priority. Start only after S9P gates G0..G8 close and protocol parity baseline is accepted.

stages.title: Next.js web GUI MVP on top of soul-cli JSON mode
stages.notes: Queued behind S9B after S9P closure; preserve shared CLI JSON contract and parity semantics.
